titleStmt.title: A journey to London in the year 1698 after the ingenuous method of that made by Dr. Martin Lyster to Paris in the same year, &c. / written originally in French by Monsieur Sorbiere and newly translated into English.
titleStmt.author: King, William, 1663-1712.
Sorbière, Samuel, 1615-1670. Relation d'un voyage en Angleterre.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by A. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Fictiously attributed to Sorbière but written by William King. Cf. DNB.
Satire on Lister's work: Journey to Paris in the year 1698.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
